title: I Made an AI-Generated Valentine's Day Card. Here's How It Turned Out
description: Save your money on expensive cards and make a personalized version using artificial intelligence.
content: Valentine's Day is almost here, and we could all use the extra love and laughs -- even if it's from a Valentine's Day card. I don't like the corporatization of Hallmark's holiday, and given that I don't have any sketching skills to hand-make a card, ... [3713 chars]

title: Germany's Helsing, HENSOLDT team up on autonomous systems for Euro CCA
description: “The future of modern defence systems lies in the intelligent and networked interplay of sensor technology and artificial intelligence,” HENDSOLT CEO Oliver Dörre said in the statement.
content:
WASHINGTON — Germany’s Helsing and HENSOLDT are joining forces to develop “AI-enabled combat air systems,” by way of upgrading Helsing’s CA-1 autonomous aircraft, according to a statement released today.

title: US stocks drop sharply as investors hunt for losers that will be hurt by AI
description: U.S. stocks fell sharply as the market punished companies seen as potential losers from artificial-intelligence technology
content:
NEW YORK (AP) — U.S. stocks fell sharply Thursday as the market punished companies seen as potential losers from artificial-intelligence technology.
The S&P 500 sank 1.6% for its second-worst day since Thanksgiving, though it’s still near its all-tim... [5009 chars]

description: Markets are paying more and more attention to hyperscalers' plans to spend more and more money on artificial intelligence.

title: Samsung starts mass production of next-generation AI memory chip
description: Samsung Electronics announced Thursday it had started mass production of next-generation memory chips to power artificial intelligence, touting an "industry-leading" breakthrough. title: AI chatbots give bad health advice, research finds
description: Next time you're considering consulting Dr ChatGPT, perhaps think again. Despite now being able to ace most medical licensing exams, artificial intelligence chatbots do not give humans better health advice than they can find using more traditional methods, according to a new study. "Despite all the hype, AI just isn't…

title: US STOCKS-Wall Street sinks as tech rout deepens on AI angst
description: Wall Street's main indexes reversed sharply on Thursday as investors intensified their selloff of technology shares and fled transport stocks amid worries about artificial intelligence disruption, while they digested the latest labor market data and awaited a key inflation report.
